name: Asynco
description:
Oh no! You accidentally connected to another robot in addition to your own. Now you have to control both robots through the test levels. There is one more problem however, there might be some delay in the mistaken connection. Good luck!

Controls:

  • Move with LEFT/RIGHT or A/D
  • Jump with SPACE
  • Reset/Replay level with R
  • When level is cleared, press SPACE to continue
  • Go to level select with ESC

Made in <48 for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, themed "Joined Together".
